name: wunmap
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: wunss(co(c0, cmap, c1), c2, co(c0, cpm, c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmap, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpm, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmap, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpm, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpm, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmap, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

stmt.origin: a1i(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1)))
-| wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmap, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1))

body.origin: |- wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmap, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: A weak universe is closed under mappings. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
